title: Quake victim
author: Unknown
text: QUAKE VICTIM: RED CROSS AND HEALTH WORKERS BANDAGE THE ARM OF A YOUNG GIRL INJURED IN AN EARTHQUAKE THAT KILLED AT LEAST 79 PEOPLE MONDAY IN COSTA RICA AND PANAMA. FOOD AND WATER WERE IN SHORT SUPPLY AS RESCUERS CONTINUED TO SEARCH FOR SURVIVORSCaption:  PHOTOAP: QUAKE VICTIM
